SEARCH
Package gw.pl.external

Class Invoker

java.lang.Object
gw.pl.external.Invoker
@Deprecated public abstract class Invoker extends Object
Deprecated.
External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.
Used by external interfaces to invoke static methods, properties, and constructors.
Author:
pdalbora

    • getInstance

      Deprecated.
      Gets the single Invoker instance

    • setInstance

      protected static void setInstance(Invoker invoker)
      Deprecated.
      Sets the single Invoker instance. Only to be called by the application.

    • construct

      public abstract Object construct(Class<?> clazz, Class<?>[] paramTypes, Object[] args)
      Deprecated.
      Invoke a a constructor for a proxied external type.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the external class version of the type
      paramTypes - an array of the external class parameter types. This corresponds to the decalaired method parameter types (not the argument runtime types).
      args - the arguments
      Returns:
      the result of invoking the static method.

    • invokeStaticMethod

      public abstract Object invokeStaticMethod(Class<?> clazz, String methodName, Class<?>[] paramTypes, Object[] args)
      Deprecated.
      Invoke a static method for a proxied external type.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the external class version of the type
      methodName - the name of the static method
      paramTypes - an array of the external class parameter types. This corresponds to the decalaired method parameter types (not the argument runtime types).
      args - the arguments
      Returns:
      the result of invoking the static method.

    • getStaticProperty

      public abstract Object getStaticProperty(Class<?> clazz, String propertyName)
      Deprecated.
      Get a static property value for a proxied external type.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the external class version of the type
      propertyName - the name of the static peroperty
      Returns:
      the property value

    • setStaticProperty

      public abstract void setStaticProperty(Class<?> clazz, String propertyName, Object value)
      Deprecated.
      Set a static property value for a proxied external type.
      Parameters:
      clazz - the external class version of the type
      propertyName - the name of the static property
      value - the value to set

    • invokeMethod

      public abstract Object invokeMethod(Object ctx, Class<?> clazz, String methodName, Class<?>[] paramTypes, Object[] args)
      Deprecated.
      Invoke a method for a proxied external type.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the object to use as context for invoking the method.
      clazz - the external class version of the type
      methodName - the name of the method
      paramTypes - an array of the external class parameter types. This corresponds to the decalaired method parameter types (not the argument runtime types).
      args - the arguments
      Returns:
      the result of invoking the method.

    • getProperty

      public abstract Object getProperty(Object ctx, Class<?> clazz, String propertyName)
      Deprecated.
      Get a property value for a proxied external type.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the object to use as context for getting the property.
      clazz - the external class version of the type
      propertyName - the name of the peroperty
      Returns:
      the property value

    • setProperty

      public abstract void setProperty(Object ctx, Class<?> clazz, String propertyName, Object value)
      Deprecated.
      Set a property value for a proxied external type.
      Parameters:
      ctx - the object to use as context for setting the property.
      clazz - the external class version of the type
      propertyName - the name of the static property
      value - the value to set
